mapper.select: select a.*,sdld.create_date as dispatch_date,sdld.work_order_time_limit from ( select sdl.id,sdl.code,swot.name,sdl.status,ur.name as create_name,srr.tel, srr.building_unit_estate_id,srr.report_detail,sdl.begin_date,sdl.revisit_date,sdl.revisit_detail from sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_work_order_type as swot,sys_report_repair as srr,user_resident as ur where sdl.work_order_type = swot.id and srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and ur.id = sdl.create_id ) as a LEFT JOIN sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld on sdld.dispatch_list_id = a.id
mapper.update: update sys_dispatch_list set sys_delete = 0 where id = #{id}

status = 7,
